summary:
I was born and raised in Afghanistan until 2015 when circumstances forced me to escape my own homeland and resettle in the Netherlands. The whole journey has been a great deal of experiences and hardships which I have gone through but I am happy and proud where I am today. 

Currently I am doing my last year of my Associated Degree in International Business Management at Hogeschool Tio, I did my first internship in 2021 at Chemelco International B.V which subsequently I was hired as part time employee in logistics. It was in 2010 when I started my first job in Afghanistan and I was 20 years old thus I have a very diverse range of 13 years of experience in Business Management.

My work experiences in Afghanistan and the Netherlands in different departments enables me to be flexible and work efficiently. I am organized, accurate, patient and able to deliver consistently high results in a challenging and pressurised work environment. I am a fast learner and because of my open-mindedness I am able to work exceptionally well with other people. Seeking a challenging job in the field of my study in a highly comparative environment at a position of responsibilities to utilize my skills.

profile_positions.title: Store Assistant

profile_positions.description:
Main Tasks:
•	Optimizing and Maintaining Freight Databases 
•	Requesting updated freight rates from the suppliers 
•	ISO Complaints Management = Recording , Analysing, Designating, Investigating, closing the complaint as well as maintaining the helicopter view database of complaints.
•	Reconciliation of customer debit notes with Supply and Sales team as well as maintaining accounts of different customers separately.
•	Understanding processes and Streamlining SOPs and Flowcharts
•	Data Sorting and Cleaning them up on SAP ( ERP Software), Tasks such as changing status of orders, Scanning and uploading supporting or transportation documents of sales orders, Updating batch numbers of purchase orders etc.
•	Sampling:  Preparing samples of products for clients abroad and sending them by posts such as DHL.

profile_positions.description:

profile_positions.title: Volunteer

profile_positions.description:
Main Tasks:
Procurement
•	Preparation of offers, contacting suppliers for quotations, negotiating the price and terms conditions, selection of supplier in consultation with technical team, Preparation of purchase order, coordination of transportation with the transportation company.
Bank related works 
•	Acquiring credit facilities such as bid Securities, performance guarantees, letter of 
           credits for tenders and contracts.
•	Maintaining their files and extending them on timely basis. Wire transfers to suppliers
           reconciliation of fund movements in accounts.
Receivables
•	Preparation of the invoices, sending to the employer and follow up till the claimed money 
     was received in company’s account.
Proposal documentation
•	Obtaining the project tender documents from the employers or tender distribution sources, 
     comprehensive review of the tender documents, preparation of the techncial and
     commercial proposal as per the guidelines in the tender documents with the support of
     technical and financial team.
Contracts 
•	Keeping and filing all project contracts.
•	Advising, guiding and supporting project management team with contractual complaince.
profile_positions.title: Commercial Officer

profile_positions.description:
Main Tasks: 
• Accounting & Book Keeping:
o	Prepare vouchers / Journals / Receipt Vouchers along with appropriate supporting documents for review & approval.
o	Record transactions in primary cash book (Excel File) and classify to the relevant budget line item.
o	Preparation of bank reconciliations for project bank account maintained in Maidan Wardak.
o	Manage all Balance Sheet accounts (Receivables and Payables)
o	Preparation of cash book and submission on time to project management office.
• Routine Payments and Treasury Operations:
o	Prepare payments for suppliers, service providers and others in accordance with company policies and procedures.
o	Liaise with bank on cash deposits & withdrawals.
o	Safeguard cash as per company policies.
• Ensuring Compliance of RGMIG Policies:
o	Guide project staff on the proper conduct of financial transactions including procurement of project supplies.
o	Check/review all financial documents

• Cost control and reporting:
o	Preparing and submitting regular reports on control of costs and prices of each price schedule line item to Project Manager and General Finance Manager based on established system and procedures.
o	Assist in the preparation of reports to the employer and budgets and spending plan for additional funds that may be raised for the project.
o	Any other tasks assigned by the supervisor.
profile_positions.title: Project Site Finance and Accounts Manager
